name.ja: <ruby>超<rt>ちょう</rt></ruby><ruby>戦<rt>せん</rt></ruby><ruby>士<rt>し</rt></ruby>の<ruby>閃<rt>せん</rt></ruby><ruby>光<rt>こう</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster, place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of the Deck, or change the battle position of 1 face-up "Black Luster Soldier" on your field.

effect.en: Change 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field to face-down Defense Position. If you have "Black Luster Soldier" face-up on your field, you can choose 2 monsters instead.
